#summary Installation instructions for Open-IG starting from version 0.8

= Introduction =

This page details the installation instructions for Open Imperium Galactica version 0.8 and above.


= Details =

1) Download the main game JAR file from the downloads page:

[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-0.8.jar open-ig-0.8.jar]

2) Download the game resource files (1.1 GB!):


[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-data-0.8.zip Data]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-audio-generic-0.8.zip Audio 1]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-audio-hu-0.8.zip Audio 2]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-audio-en-0.8.zip Audio 3]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-images-0.8.zip Images]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-01-0.8.zip Video 1]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-02-0.8.zip Video 2]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-03-0.8.zip Video 3]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-04-0.8.zip Video 4]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-05-0.8.zip Video 5]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-06-0.8.zip Video 6]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-07-0.8.zip Video 7]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-08-0.8.zip Video 8]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-09-0.8.zip Video 9]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-10-0.8.zip Video 10]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-hu-0.8.zip Video 11]<br>
[http://open-ig.googlecode.com/files/open-ig-video-en-0.8.zip Video 12]


3) Place all these files into the same directory

4) Run the game:

 * double click on {{{open-ig-0.8.jar}}}, or
 * run the following command line: {{{java -Xmx256M -jar open-ig-0.8.jar}}}, or
 * create a shell script/batch file and put in: {{{javaw -Xmx256M -jar open-ig-0.8.jar}}}

5) When the game loads, it should display the setup screen. Choose your preferred language:

http://darksideunderflow.com/images/resources.php?id=open-ig-setup-0.8-1.png

6) On the *Files* page, click on the *Auto-locate* button. It should find all 17 zip files in the current directory:

http://darksideunderflow.com/images/resources.php?id=open-ig-setup-0.8-2.png

7) Click on the *Save & Run* button. The main menu should popup.

http://karnokd.uw.hu/images/open-ig-mainmenu.png

8) When you start a new game, you can use *F1* to go to the Bridge screen, *F11* to go to the demo statistics screen and *F12* to go to the demo achievements screen.

9) Unfortunately, everything else is missing (not ported to the new, independent version).
